dimwishlist:item=2147010335

title:u/pandapaxxy's Season of the Chosen Nightfall Ordeal, Ritual, Season Pass Breakdown, M+KB
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/lnw0v7/nightfall_ordeal_ritual_season_pass_breakdown_mnk/

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "Overflow is easily one of my favorite perks in all of Destiny 2. Simply walk over special or heavy ammo and not only is your gun reloaded but its mag is doubled? Heck yes. Pair that with the new(ish) one for all perk that gives you better damage from clearing adds? A match made in heaven. If you want more direct damage increases then rampage is your go-to. Never have to reload as long as you can pick up ammo." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "For PvP the only stat you want to invest in is range. You could opt for full bore because we’re going for quickdraw so the drop in handling isn’t as bad, but the drop in stability is something I’d try to avoid. Hammer-forged rifling gives the best bump in range without sacrificing any stats. High-caliber rounds offers that extra flinch to help you in duels and the only real PvP perk in the last column is rangefinder." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb

// Shadow Price (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "For PvE I’ll always recommend overflow whenever it’s possible. Overflow just makes playing any PvE content that much easier because one of your weapons is always reloaded and oftentimes has double capacity. [...] One for all can make spreading the damage a lot easier and I find it to be one of the top perks for PvE. If you want something a bit “faster” than opting for swashbuckler will provide that." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb

// THE SWARM (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "Another high-impact machine gun isn’t the worst thing, but most of them are outclassed in one way or another. So unless this weapon archetype gets a damage buff we won’t see them too often. To make the most of it, outlaw will get you over that abysmal 44 reload speed." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,mkb

// THE SWARM (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "For PvP anything to maximize range while also making sure not to destroy the stability. A 4C ttk is possible but not if you have to fight the gun and flinch at the same time. I said this a few times already but DO NOT drop the stability. Even on MnK stability does help, and with a weapon as unforgiving as this you really need to hit your shots." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb
dimwishlist:item=3836861464&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2450788523,1890422124
dimwishlist:item=3836861464&perks=1482024992,3142289711,2450788523,1890422124
dimwishlist:item=3836861464&perks=1840239774,3142289711,2450788523,1890422124

title:u/pandapaxxy's Season of the Chosen Nightfall Ordeal, Ritual, Season Pass Breakdown, Controller
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/lnw5dn/nightfall_ordeal_ritual_season_pass_breakdown/

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / Controller): "Overflow is easily one of my favorite perks in all of Destiny 2. Simply walk over special or heavy ammo and not only is your gun reloaded but its mag is doubled? Heck yes. Pair that with the new(ish) one for all perk that gives you better damage from clearing adds? A match made in heaven. If you want more direct damage increases then rampage is your go-to. Never have to reload as long as you can pick up ammo." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,controller

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "You can nearly ignore handling if you roll quickdraw. Throw on targeting mods to make the ADS feel even better. While you can make any of the fourth column perks work in PvP I feel rangefinder is the only one that remotely sways PvP. You won’t really find any benefit from rangefinder in PvE, whereas any of the other perks can work in PvE but not entirely in PvP." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,controller

// Shadow Price (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / Controller): "For PvE I’ll always recommend overflow whenever it’s possible. Overflow just makes playing any PvE content that much easier because one of your weapons is always reloaded and oftentimes has double capacity. [...] One for all can make spreading the damage a lot easier and I find it to be one of the top perks for PvE. If you want something a bit “faster” than opting for swashbuckler will provide that." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,controller
